targets.expr: sum by(http_user_agent) (count_over_time({job="varlogs", region=~"$region", status=~"$status", blockchain=~"$blockchain"} | json http_user_agent [$__range]))
topk(10, sum by (request, status) (count_over_time({job="varlogs", region=~"$region", status=~"$status", blockchain=~"$blockchain"} | json request [$__range])))
sum by(blockchain, region) (count_over_time({job="varlogs", region=~"$region", status=~"$status", blockchain=~"$blockchain"} | status = `401` [$interval]))

panels.title: Error Codes by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: sum by(blockchain, region) (count_over_time({job="varlogs", region=~"$region", status=~"$status", blockchain=~"$blockchain"} | status = `401` [$__range]))

panels.title: Error Codes by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: avg by(blockchain, region) (avg_over_time({job="varlogs", region=~"$region", status=~"2\\d{2}", blockchain=~"$blockchain"} | json request_time | unwrap request_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) * 1000)

panels.title: Average Request Time by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.50, {job="varlogs", region=~"$region", status=~"2\\d{2}", blockchain=~"$blockchain"} | json request_time | unwrap request_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) by (blockchain, region) * 1000

panels.title: Request Time P50 by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.90, {job="varlogs", region=~"$region", status=~"2\\d{2}", blockchain=~"$blockchain"} | json request_time | unwrap request_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) by (blockchain, region) * 1000

panels.title: Request Time P90 by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: avg by(blockchain, region) (avg_over_time({job="varlogs", region=~"$region", status=~"2\\d{2}", blockchain=~"$blockchain"} | json upstream_response_time | unwrap upstream_response_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) * 1000)

panels.title: Average Upstream Latency by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.50, {job="varlogs", region=~"$region", status=~"2\\d{2}", blockchain=~"$blockchain"} | json upstream_response_time | unwrap upstream_response_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) by (blockchain, region) * 1000

panels.title: Upstream Latency P50 by Blockchain and Region

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.90, {job="varlogs", region=~"$region", status=~"2\\d{2}", blockchain=~"$blockchain"} | json upstream_response_time | unwrap upstream_response_time | __error__=`` [$interval]) by (blockchain, region) * 1000
